summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Legislative Department, authorizing participation in the Northwest Digital Archives Project, authorizing the City Clerk to enter into an agreement with Oregon State University (OSU), authorizing acceptance of funds as a subcontractor from OSU for financial assistance to support creation of Encoded Archival Description (EAD) finding aids for inclusion in a regional national union catalog, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the General Fund therefore, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
